headerDisplay:
Nest plug-in for Homebridge using the native Nest API

See the GitHub page for help selecting your autentication type.

form.title: Nest Authentication
form.description: To use a Nest Account with homebridge-nest, you will need to obtain an access token from the Nest web app. (Note - no Nest developer account is required.) Simply go to https://home.nest.com in your browser and log in. Once that's done, go to https://home.nest.com/session in your browser, and copy your full access_token.

form.title: Google Authentication
form.description: Google Accounts (mandatory for new Nest devices after August 2019, with an optional migration for earlier accounts) are now supported. Setting up a Google Account with homebridge-nest is a pain, but only needs to be done once, as long as you don't log out of your Google Account.
